# Source: https://www.electronjs.org/docs/latest/api/structures/jump-list-category

# JumpListCategory Object

- `type` string (optional) - One of the following:
  - `tasks` - Items in this category will be placed into the standard `Tasks` category. There can be only one such category, and it will always be displayed at the bottom of the Jump List.
  - `frequent` - Displays a list of files frequently opened by the app, the name of the category and its items are set by Windows.
  - `recent` - Displays a list of files recently opened by the app, the name of the category and its items are set by Windows. Items may be added to this category indirectly using `app.addRecentDocument(path)`.
  - `custom` - Displays tasks or file links, `name` must be set by the app.
- `name` string (optional) - Must be set if `type` is `custom`, otherwise it should be omitted.
- `items` JumpListItem\[\] (optional) - Array of [JumpListItem](/docs/latest/api/structures/jump-list-item) objects if `type` is `tasks` or `custom`, otherwise it should be omitted.

[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]note

If a `JumpListCategory` object has neither the `type` nor the `name` property set then its `type` is assumed to be `tasks`. If the `name` property is set but the `type` property is omitted then the `type` is assumed to be `custom`.

[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)]note

The maximum length of a Jump List item\'s `description` property is 260 characters. Beyond this limit, the item will not be added to the Jump List, nor will it be displayed.

[![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)Edit this page](https://github.com/electron/electron/edit/main/docs/api/structures/jump-list-category.md)
